list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a verbal or written remark expressing an opinion or reaction.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: you asked for comments on the new proposals
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Bạn đã hỏi ý kiến về các đề xuất mới

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a piece of text placed within a program to help other users to understand it, which the computer ignores when running the program.

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the company would not comment on the venture
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Công ty sẽ không bình luận về liên doanh

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: place a piece of specially tagged explanatory text within (a program) to assist other users.
